title: Bug 120315: 'none' display property not taking effect in new PDF emitter.
description: When the display property of an item is set to 'none', it is expected that the item will be hidden in the PDF preview. However, in the current implementation, the item is still visible in the PDF preview. This bug report highlights the issue and provides the necessary details to reproduce it in order to fix this issue.
OB: When viewing the PDF preview after setting an item's display property to 'none', the item is still visible.
EB: The expected behavior is that the item should be hidden in the PDF preview after setting its display property to 'none'.
SR: To reproduce the issue: 1. Set the display property of an item to 'none'. 2. Preview the PDF. 3. Observe that the item is still visible in the PDF preview.
